Lyric:
[by:香桃Chantal]
[ti:Never Give Up ]
[ar:Vexento]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]
[00:05.24]There're some times in life when you fall down
[00:09.45]And you feel like you don't have the strength to back up
[00:12.98]So... Sort of put a mask on your face when you come to school and...
[00:18.45]Pretend that everything's okay when it's not and you go home and...
[00:22.98]Lay in your bed when no one's looking at you
[00:26.73]You don't have to impress anybody
[00:29.18]And you're yourself
[00:32.08]And fear comes in
[00:33.78]You know the fear that you have as soon as you walk to the doors of your house
[00:37.59]Maybe there's a broken home
[00:39.52]Maybe you have doubt in your life
[00:43.22]Maybe you don't know for sure what's gonna be happening in the future and...
[00:46.47]It scares you
[00:48.67]Maybe about.... You... Maybe you worried about what people think of you
[00:51.66]What people sayin' about you
[00:55.02]Does that fear paralyses you and I just wanted to ask you today
[00:58.27]Do you think you have hope?
[01:01.42]I'm not here today to tell you I understand you pain
[01:03.82]I don't know how it feels to be abused
[01:05.57]I don't know how it feels to feel quote fat and you get an eating disorder
[01:09.93]I don't know how it feels to have a broken home
[01:12.98]But I know how it feels to have a broken heart and I know how it feels to be alone
[01:17.23]And I just want you to know that it's not the end...
[02:15.58]You change yourself
[02:16.84]You come to school
[02:18.64]And everybody swore around me in high school
[02:20.60]So I started swearing... Why!?
[02:22.05]Because it's the cool thing to do
[02:23.60]Everybody swears
[02:24.91]So I don't want to be left out
[02:27.76]And I wanted to accepted
[02:28.81]So I started swearing
[02:29.91]You go to a party
[02:30.82]Everybody's drinking
[02:31.73]So you drink... Why!?
[02:32.48]Why everybody around me's doing the big deal!
[02:36.33]And you start losing yourself
[02:37.83]You start putting your security in temporary things
[02:42.59]You start putting your happiness in things that won't last
[02:47.74]You can get drunk all you like
[02:49.59]But in the morning you're gonna be sober with a headache with the same problems
[02:55.04]
